project.name: website
project.description: The Website Team strives to improve the Gentoo website(s).

longdescription.p: As a subproject of the Public Relations Team, we are working on getting our public website(s) into shape. Having used a custom system geared towards documentation for the past decade for creating our main website, we will be evaulating alternatives that improve usability, apperance and navigation of the site.

body.p: If you are interested in participating, please join #gentoo-www on Freenode IRC.
